posts.post_content:
I'm starting to assemble a back run of T206 Frank Arellanes cards. I have listed a bunch of cards in my trade folder under my signature link. If they do not have a price they are only for trade. I will also buy any that I may need. I currently have Piedmont, Tolstoi, Polar Bear, Sweet Cap (30) and Cycle 350. 
                                           Thanks,
                                             Steve

I just added more cards to my trade folder in hopes of acquiring a few more backs.......
                                         Thanks,
                                          Steve

Bump...a few new cards added to the trade folder. 
                                      Thanks,
                                        Steve

Curious why you've picked Arellanes as the subject for a back run...  (all I've got is a couple of Piedmonts, sorry that I can't help ya)

Best of luck,
--S

Another bump...looking for AB, Carolina Brights and Drum. Just added more cards to the trade pile including 2 Ramly's. I also have a T206 Gandil(double name) with EPDG back that I will get scanned soon.
                                           Thanks,
                                             Steve

Still looking for American Beauty, Carolina Brights and Drum. Many cards in the trade/sell folder or will buy as well.
                                          Thanks,
                                            Steve
